title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Cayo Perico Survival
content:
Cayo Perico is overrun with all manner of undead threats. It’s unclear if the scourge stems from a batch of bad party favors or an ancient curse, but one thing’s clear: they’re out for blood.

Mow them down to enable your escape via the landing zone, or take on endless Waves and see how long you can last while reaping 2X GTA$ and RP on Cayo Perico Survival (4X for GTA+ Members) through September 10.
